column4: Ok guys, I have 2 questions. I used to know this but somehow cannot now recall.
1. How can I tell how many packages I have installed on my Ubuntu box from the commandline?

2. How can I find out the total number of packages available for install in each of the "main", "restricted", "universe", "multiverse", "karmic-updates", "karmic-updates", "karmic-backports" and "karmic-security" repos again, from the commandline?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
